column2: # poly trend and sine-cos is seasonal variance, 12 yerly, 6 semester, 4 quarter

lm(formula = y ~ poly(tt, 2) + cos(2 * tt * pi/12) + sin(2 * 
    tt * pi/12) + cos(2 * tt * pi/6) + sin(2 * tt * pi/6) + cos(2 * 
    tt * pi/4) + sin(2 * tt * pi/4), data = deathsDecompTrendSeasonal)
plot.ts(deathsDecompTrendSeasonal,  main = "Deaths: trend and seasonal components")
